contact.headline: Ready to find your perfect apartment? Get in touch to explore our available units, discuss payment plans, and learn about our real estate services.
contact.description: Whether you're looking to buy your first apartment, invest in real estate, or need information about payment options and financing, our expert team is here to help. Contact us today to discover available apartments, discuss payment plans, and get answers to all your real estate questions.

methodology.title: How We Work
methodology.heading: Our Proven Methodology
methodology.description: At Jinan, we follow a systematic approach to property development that ensures quality, transparency, and customer satisfaction at every stage. From site selection to final handover, our methodology reflects our commitment to building exceptional residential developments in Sharjah.
methodology.step01Description: We conduct thorough market research and feasibility studies to identify prime locations that offer long-term value and growth potential. Our team evaluates accessibility, infrastructure, and community needs to ensure strategic site selection.
methodology.step02Description: Our architects and designers create innovative residential layouts that maximize space, natural light, and lifestyle amenities. We focus on climate-responsive design, energy efficiency, and modern living standards tailored for Sharjah's unique environment.
methodology.step03Description: We handle all regulatory approvals and building permits required by Sharjah's authorities. Our experienced team ensures full compliance with UAE construction standards and municipal regulations for seamless project progression.
methodology.step04Description: With trusted construction partners, we maintain rigorous quality control throughout the building process. We use premium materials, implement advanced construction techniques, and conduct regular inspections to ensure the highest standards of craftsmanship.
methodology.step05Description: Before handover, every unit undergoes comprehensive quality checks and inspections. We test all systems, verify finishes, and ensure that every aspect meets our exacting standards and exceeds customer expectations.
methodology.step06Description: We provide a smooth handover process with complete documentation and property orientation. Our dedicated after-sales team continues to support residents, ensuring their satisfaction and maintaining the value of their investment.

footer.welcomeDescription: Welcome to Jinan, where innovation meets our passion in real estate development that started with a dream to build exceptional communities.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: Jinan ("Jinan", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

section1.heading: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the site includes:

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, telephone number, and demographic information (such as your age and gender) that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the site, such as online chat and message boards.

derivativeData.title: Derivative Data
derivativeData.content: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the site.

financialData.title: Financial Data
financialData.content: Financial information, such as data related to your payment method (e.g., valid credit card number, card brand, expiration date) that we may collect when you purchase, order, return, exchange, or request information about our services from the site.

contactForms.title: Contact Forms
contactForms.content: When you fill out contact forms, request property information, or schedule property viewings, we collect the information you provide, including your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you choose to share.

section2.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the site to:
list: Create and manage your account
Process your transactions and send you related information
Email you regarding your account or order
Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the site
Generate a personal profile about you to make future visits more personalized
Increase the efficiency and operation of the site
Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience
Notify you of updates to the site
Perform other business activities as needed
Request feedback and contact you about your use of the site
Respond to product and customer service requests
Send you marketing and promotional communications
Resolve disputes and troubleshoot problems

section3.heading: 3. Disclosure of Your Information
section3.content: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:

byLaw.title: By Law or to Protect Rights
byLaw.content: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParty.content: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance.

businessTransfers.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfers.content: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.

realEstatePartners.title: Real Estate Partners
realEstatePartners.content: With your consent, we may share your information with our real estate partners, property developers, or third parties for the purpose of providing you with property-related services, property viewings, or promotional offers related to real estate.

section4.heading: 4. Third-Party Websites
section4.content: The site may contain links to third-party websites and applications of interest, including advertisements and external services, that are not affiliated with us. Once you have used these links to leave the site, any information you provide to these third parties is not covered by this Privacy Policy, and we cannot guarantee the safety and privacy of your information.

section5.heading: 5. Security of Your Information
section5.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.

section6.heading: 6. Policy for Children
section6.content: We do not knowingly solicit information from or market to children under the age of 18. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible.

section7.heading: 7. Your Rights
section7.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
list: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data
The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate
The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions
The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data
The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data
The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization

section8.heading: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section8.content: We may use cookies, web beacons, tracking pixels, and other tracking technologies on the site to help customize the site and improve your experience. When you access the site, your personal information is not collected through the use of tracking technology. Most browsers are set to accept cookies by default. You can remove or reject cookies, but be aware that such action could affect the availability and functionality of the site.

section9.heading: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

section10.heading: 10. Contact Us
section10.content: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Jinan ("Jinan", "we", "us", or "our"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") govern your use of our website located at jinan.ae (the "Service") operated by Jinan. Our Privacy Policy also governs your use of our Service and explains how we collect, safeguard and disclose information that results from your use of our web pages.

section1.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access the Service. Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with the Privacy Policy of Jinan.

section2.heading: 2. Use License
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Jinan's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
list: Modify or copy the materials
Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial)
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Jinan's website
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server

section3.heading: 3. Property Information
section3.content: All property listings, descriptions, images, pricing, and availability information on this website are subject to change without notice. While we strive to ensure the accuracy of information, Jinan does not warrant or guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any property information displayed on the website.

propertyAvailability.title: Property Availability
propertyAvailability.content: Property availability is subject to prior sale and may change without notice. We reserve the right to withdraw any property from the market at any time.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: All prices quoted are in UAE Dirhams (AED) unless otherwise stated. Prices are subject to change without notice and do not include applicable government fees, taxes, or other charges unless specifically mentioned.

propertyImages.title: Property Images
propertyImages.content: Images and virtual tours are for illustrative purposes only and may not accurately represent the actual condition, layout, or finishes of properties. All measurements are approximate.

section4.heading: 4. Purchase Terms
section4.content: When purchasing or reserving a property through our website, the following terms apply:

reservations.title: Reservations
reservations.content: Reservations are subject to availability and our acceptance. A reservation does not constitute a legally binding sale until a formal purchase agreement is executed.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Payment terms, deposit requirements, and installment schedules will be detailed in the purchase agreement. All payments must be made in accordance with the terms specified in your individual purchase agreement.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation and refund policies vary by property and will be outlined in your specific purchase agreement. Please review these terms carefully before making any payments.

section5.heading: 5. User Accounts
section5.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for keeping your account information current. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

section6.heading: 6. Prohibited Uses
section6.content: You may use our Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Service:
list: In any way that violates any applicable national or international law or regulation
To transmit, or procure the sending of, any advertising or promotional material without our prior written consent
To impersonate or attempt to impersonate the company, a company employee, another user, or any other person or entity
In any way that infringes upon the rights of others, or in any way is illegal, threatening, fraudulent, or harmful
To engage in any other conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use or enjoyment of the website

section7.heading: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Jinan and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.

section8.heading: 8. Disclaimer
section8.content: The information on this website is provided on an "as is" basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Jinan excludes all representations, warranties, conditions, and terms relating to our website and the use of this website (including, without limitation, any warranties implied by law in respect of satisfactory quality, fitness for purpose, and/or the use of reasonable care and skill).

noWarranty.title: No Warranty
noWarranty.content: Jinan makes no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the website or its content. We do not warrant that the website will be available at all times or that access will be uninterrupted.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Jinan, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the Service.

section9.heading: 9. Indemnification
section9.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Jinan and its licensee and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees), resulting from or arising out of: (a) your use and access of the Service; (b) your violation of any term of these Terms; (c) your violation of any third party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right.

section10.heading: 10. Governing Law
section10.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

section11.heading: 11. Dispute Resolution
section11.content: Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms or the use of the Service shall be resolved through negotiation in good faith. If negotiation fails, disputes shall be referred to the courts of Sharjah, United Arab Emirates, which shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

section12.heading: 12. Changes to Terms
section12.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

section13.heading: 13. Contact Information
section13.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: At Jinan ("Jinan", "we", "us", or "our"), we are committed to providing exceptional customer support and service. This Support Policy outlines our commitment to you, our valued customers, and explains how we handle support requests, inquiries, and customer service matters.

section1.heading: 1. Support Hours
section1.content: Our customer support team is available during the following hours:

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.content: Sunday - Thursday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (UAE Time). We are closed on Fridays and Saturdays, as well as on official UAE public holidays.

responseTimes.title: Response Times
responseTimes.content: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters related to property sales or reservations, we will make every effort to respond as quickly as possible.

section2.heading: 2. Contact Methods
section2.content: You can reach our support team through the following channels:
list: Email: info@jinan.ae
In-Person: Visit our office at Orient building - 2nd Floor - Office 23 Al Arouba St - Al Mareija - Hay Al Gharb - Sharjah, UAE
Website Contact Form: Available on our contact page

section3.heading: 3. Types of Support
section3.content: Our support team can assist you with:
list: Property inquiries and information requests
Scheduling property viewings and site visits
Purchase process questions and guidance
Payment and financing inquiries
Documentation and legal matters related to property transactions
After-sales support and property management queries
Technical support for website and online services
General information about our projects and services

section4.heading: 4. Support Priority Levels
section4.content: We prioritize support requests based on their urgency and nature:

highPriority.title: High Priority
highPriority.content: Urgent matters related to active property purchases, payment issues, or time-sensitive transactions. These are addressed immediately during business hours.

mediumPriority.title: Medium Priority
mediumPriority.content: Property inquiries, viewing requests, and general information requests. These are typically responded to within 24 hours.

lowPriority.title: Low Priority
lowPriority.content: General questions, feedback, or non-urgent inquiries. These are handled within 2-3 business days.

section5.heading: 5. Information Required for Support
section5.content: To help us assist you more effectively, please provide the following information when contacting support:
list: Your full name and contact information
Property or project name (if applicable)
Reference number or transaction ID (if applicable)
Detailed description of your inquiry or issue
Preferred method of communication
Any relevant documentation or screenshots

section6.heading: 6. Property Viewings and Site Visits
section6.content: For property viewings and site visits:

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.content: Property viewings can be scheduled through our website contact form, by phone, or by email. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to ensure availability.

cancellations.title: Cancellations
cancellations.content: If you need to cancel or reschedule a viewing, please notify us at least 12 hours in advance. This helps us accommodate other customers.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.content: Visitors may be required to provide identification and sign a visitor registration form for security and safety purposes.

section7.heading: 7. After-Sales Support
section7.content: Our commitment to you doesn't end after your purchase. We provide ongoing support for:
list: Property handover process
Warranty and maintenance inquiries
Documentation and title deed matters
Property management services
Community and facilities information

section8.heading: 8. Escalation Process
section8.content: If you are not satisfied with the support received, you may escalate your concern:

level1.title: Level 1
level1.content: Contact our Customer Support Manager at info@jinan.ae with "Escalation" in the subject line.

level2.title: Level 2
level2.content: For serious concerns, you may request to speak with senior management by contacting our main office.

legalDisputes.title: Legal Disputes
legalDisputes.content: For legal disputes, please refer to our Terms and Conditions for dispute resolution procedures.

section9.heading: 9. Feedback and Complaints
section9.content: We welcome your feedback and take all complaints seriously. Please contact us at info@jinan.ae with "Feedback" or "Complaint" in the subject line. We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours and work to resolve your concerns promptly.

section10.heading: 10. Confidentiality
section10.content: All information shared with our support team is treated with strict confidentiality in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

section11.heading: 11. Limitations
section11.content: While we strive to provide the best possible support, please note:
list: Support is provided during business hours only
We cannot provide legal or financial advice beyond property-related matters
Some requests may require consultation with third-party service providers
Response times may be extended during peak periods or holidays

section12.heading: 12. Updates to This Policy
section12.content: We may update this Support Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
